name: Restoration Point Guard
desc:
2 Cyberse monsters
Once per turn, if another Link Monster is Link Summoned: This turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If a Link Monster you control that was Link Summoned using this card as material is destroyed by an opponent's card effect, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Restoration Point Guard" once per turn.
